title: Looking for a couple low grade HOFs
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for a couple low grade HOFs
posts.post_content:
Posted By: BlackSoxFan
Hi gang,
I'm looking to buy something here in the next few days. What's important is that the player is either a HOF member or notable for some other reason.  I am searching for 2 cards - one pre-war and one from early topps/bowman sets.

In a perfect world - a T206 or a '33 Goudey would be great; however, I'm open to suggestions.  Looking to spend somewhere in the $50-$60 range per card.  Graded would be preferred.

Thanks!
